name: FingerTapping
0:
”Alexa open Finger Tapping”
”Alexa ask Finger Tapping to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: finger tapping
des:
Immerse yourself in the rhythmic world of Finger Tapping. Bring the subtle yet profound sounds of finger tapping right into your space. Whether you're seeking to enhance concentration, find comfort in the soft, repetitive noises, or simply enjoy the unique acoustics of finger taps, Finger Tapping is here to transform your environment.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Finger Tapping
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
